hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Bug Bottle# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Boomerang#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #an Odd Mushroom#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Lab).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.
